name: band-together
description: A band companion app for musicians

scripts.nuke: docker compose down && docker system prune -a -f --volumes
scripts.submodule:install: cd db && bunx --bun bun install && cd ../api && bun install && cd ../client && bun install && cd ../cms-api && bun install && cd ../cms-client && bun install
scripts.submodule:version: git submodule foreach 'echo package.json version: $(cat package.json | grep version)'
